SEARCH
Package view.Doctor.records

Class DoctorUpdateMedicalRecordDetailsView

java.lang.Object
view.View
view.Doctor.records.DoctorUpdateMedicalRecordDetailsView
public class DoctorUpdateMedicalRecordDetailsView extends View
DoctorUpdateMedicalRecordDetailsView is a View that allows doctors to update the details of a medical record entry. Doctors can update the diagnosis, treatment plan, prescription, and medical services provided.
Since:
2024-11-17
